locations.title: K & T Truck Stop
locations.content: K & T Truck Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Not a bad little truck stop.    The little diner inside is open from 0800 to 1800 hrs.  The have two shower, @ $8.75. you can do a load of laundry wash&dry for $2.75 ; not bad at all.   The employees  are friendly.

‚Ä¶ The stairs have not been vacuumed and over a year I would bed . When you take a shower and you get out you feel like you're needing another one they are so  Nasty. The owner should be ashamed of himself to let this dusty dirty  Place get ‚Ä¶

My husband and I stopped here for the night and got charged for two.This is uncalled for. We usually shower together and or get team showers.  They had no fans in the shower room and there was no toilet. Water leaked everywhere and I got ‚Ä¶
honestly it is okay, it's in west Virginia so it's in the country, it's a safe place to shower and park for the night.
Good food in the restaurant nice people there showers are kind of small no toilet in the shower adequate parking you can park about 20 trucks
Dirty filthy same shoes been in the shower someone left in there
Nice shower facilities  and cool old school fair game!
Good place to park eat and shower.
Nice shower, friendly people

locations.title: TA Travel Center
locations.content: TA Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: This has to be one of the best ta I have stayed at shower was worth every penny clean and nice water pressure and heat. driver lounges are nice and there are several upstairs and downstairs. employees were nice and helpful plenty of parking ‚Ä¶

Quiet, Clean, Peaceful.
The shower I had was very clean(water pressure and temperature was perfect, they have 2 pool tables.
Laundry center(very clean) 4 washers, 4 dryers.
Drivers lounge has ample amount of seating.
12/16/23

Stopped for a shower, was hesitant from others reviews, but glad I ignored.  Shower #4 was spotless.  Even the ceiling vents and fan blades were lint free!  Pressure was great.  Water stayed hot the entire shower.  Everything was well ‚Ä¶

To all of my fellow truckers. I beg of you. If you tip a waiter, why wouldn't you tip a person who makes sure your shower is clean? I've just met Mike. My god, that shower was spotless. Just read other people's reviews. You can tell if ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ stop opening. I was going to stop at this TA but seeing reviews and closed restaurant. I'm at new Loves 130 miles south. I get 2 free shower every day, free parking clean brand new shower.  I-77 ext 58 they even have food here ! Bastian VA
One of the better handicap showers the shower  Seat where is adjusted properly The water was slow to get warm but all in all decent shower

Stopped here at about 4am hoping to find a spot due to driving all night I DID got some sleep went for a shower and I must say I'm impressed by how clean it was. I don't need the restaurant cause I cook my own food on my truck but besides ‚Ä¶

I am OTR and I stopped to fuel up and shower. I forgot my debit card and drivers license in the shower and a woman who works here ran out and found me in the parking lot to return them! These folks are wonderful and top notch! This might ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ sweet. Other than that this place sucks worse than the normal TA. No hot water. So we were offered a cold shower...and of course the restaurant opens 30 minutes after the parking lot is empty. TA was once a great place to stop. Not anymore.
Very Cleen üöø shower Diesel price.3.36 good üëç ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: This truck stop serves its purpose. You will get no thrills here. The staff is always great with me and I‚Äôve never had to wait for a clean shower.

Good truck stop nice people problem is they only have one person working nights and they can't keep showers clean plus tend to customers up front guy working up front apologized that he didn't have a shower available because of that

locations.title: Pilot Travel Center
locations.content: Pilot Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Love this place. New shower heads so perfect water pressure! The place was sparkling clean and super nice night staff!! The shower rooms smelled good like tropical spray, and they have real live flowers in the shower rooms! Makes the room ‚Ä¶

One lady is working by the name of Lana she looks like she is new and line of people is here no help no manager still no body got thier fuel receipt , people need shower fuel receipt need to buy drinks

The experience that we had here was beyond the best ever.  From traveling,  my husband and I were looking forward to a shower that was greatfully given to us for free. The shower room is amazing.  Very clean.  Great staff. Amazing water ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ We are doing a 34 here and everything here has been great. I just got done taking a shower and it was by far the cleanest shower I have been in at any Pilot or Flying J.  The fresh flowers by the sink and the hair dryer hanging on the ‚Ä¶
Awful truck stop. Waiting forever for a shower. Truck parking lot smaller then a circle k gas station and only 3 bathroom stalls if they aren‚Äôt all clogged . This place needs some serious help

I give it 4 stars for the showers and counter service, as mentioned before the parking is minimal, and sure could use an expansion but I understand how that can be an issue. I want to give a thumbs up to Wayne who obviously takes care of ‚Ä¶

This place was jam packed when I stopped for fuel and a shower and still the showers and restrooms were clean. The shower room smelled fresh. The staff was excellent. I had contact with 3 staff members. All three were super friendly ad ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ ! All the people on the pilot side were so friendly and polite. They have the updated showers and they even put flowers in each one plus the women's restroom (very nice touch). Had mints in the shower along with a thank you note & a card ‚Ä¶
Good shower, okay Arby's here. ‚Ä¶

By far the best shower experience Ive had at a  pilot  ! The shower really was spot less everything was clean , all towels were fresh . They gave  a bottle of water , a couple mints & a bar of soap ! Water was hot and the stream was strong ‚Ä¶

locations.content: Love's Travel Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: I had the pleasure of using the shower facilities at Love‚Äôs, and I must say, it was an incredible experience! The shower was exceptionally clean‚Äîone of the cleanest and most well-maintained I‚Äôve seen anywhere in the U.S. They also left a ‚Ä¶

Stop here to scale load get fuel and a shower. The lady at the field desk was training a young man and was the one that fine job at it. The shower was neat and clean and had a note with the towel the message made my day thanks Kim you are ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ is happening at this gas station. I have a free shower, I have points, and the manager refused to purchase a shower for me, saying that since you don‚Äôt refuel here, you don‚Äôt have the right to use the shower. I tried to figure it out. She ‚Ä¶
truckers: water not hot. shower room not clean. Pumps not all working. Parking lot too small.

‚Ä¶ I purchased a shower at approx 2:30 in the afternoon on Sunday and it was ice cold. I mean I heard ice baths are good for you but I didn't think I'd have to pay 18.00 for one. I think what frustrated me the most, wasn't that the shower was ‚Ä¶

This place is super amazing. I pulled in today to take a shower and try to relax. My day has been horrible. I get to my shower and Ms Jennifer has left a simple little note that just touched me and made my day so much better. It's people ‚Ä¶

This made my day whoever took time to write and place it in the bathroom thanks.
The shower üöø was clean! ‚Ä¶
I Traveled over 48 States. I Never See Anything So Amazing in any others Love‚Äôs or Truck Stop. A Simple Note inside the Shower by Maranda. Stated. & Shower was So Clean.
Trucker here, the shower is very clean but the towels stink. So bring your own. Store is organized. Nice, friendly staff.

Great service, descent parking. Shower was clean, hot, and plenty of water pressure. Employees were all friendly that I encountered. Good store stock and selections. They have Chester Chicken, and McDonald's, I rarely eat McDonald's but hey ‚Ä¶

locations.title: Pilot Travel Center
locations.content: Pilot Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: The shower wasn't clean. Mold. Gross. Only 1 towel, nothing else. Trash can in shower full. The bathrooms were even worse. Trash everywhere, soap splattered on the walls and counter, trashcans overgowing, busted plug hanging from the outlet ‚Ä¶

Just stopped at this gas station for a shower and wow, what a pleasant surprise! The place is super clean and spacious, making it a real comfort stop. The shower towel was fresh and fluffy, which is always a plus. üòä Really impressed with ‚Ä¶
Stopped for a shower on Oct. 12. Shower #1 was very dirty and I couldn‚Äôt use the toilet because of feaces smear all over. See picture.
Wow really clean shower. It‚Äôs more room size in shower area. Appreciate it. üëç ‚Ä¶
The staff is awesome and there's only been a few times that a shower's toilet had stuff on the seat. Moe's is well staffed and also clean most the time, it's dimly-lit and a comfortable place to sit.

Clean showers, laundry and a Moe's SW, which is rare (the Moe's). This location is great but it does have a very small truck parking lot with only give reserve spaces, so if you want a spot with ease, your best bet is to be done with your ‚Ä¶

Awesome truck stop! Very clean, great customer service, and a thank you note in your shower room tops it off. They also have a Moe's restaurant that is great as well. Thank you for your hospitality!! ‚ù§
Clean Shower. Good hot water pressure. Will stop again. Has a Moes grill attached. Wall Mart across the street.
No, no, don't worry about it... I'll clean all the hair shavings off the toilet seat in shower 5...
Bruh! A Pilot with a Moe's? It's heaven in the country. Get fuel, get a shower , get Moe's .

locations.title: TA Travel Center
locations.content: TA Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Dirtiest TA I‚Äôve been to by far. They have one person cleaning 12 showers and the 2 main bathroom it‚Äôs impossible to keep up. I try not to use the shower when I‚Äôm here because every time I have to go look for the worker so he could clean ‚Ä¶

It‚Äôs sad to see what this location has become. It‚Äôs in serious need of an overhaul. The sewer smell emitting from inside of the store is nauseating! No one wants to smell that. Not to mention shower in it ü•¥ ‚Ä¶

Shower was good but I ate in restaurant and was the worst service I have ever had at a ta. Server was rude when she threw menus on table. I got sweet tea was never offered a refill. Food was good but server never checked to see how it was. ‚Ä¶

The service personnel in charge of cleaning the shower rooms are utterly lazy and do not thoroughly clean as they should. Toilet seat has feces stain on it and hair in sink. 'Cmon, you filled out an application for this job....why not ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ only can you buy water with SpongeBob‚Äôs face on it, not only can you walk into country pride at any point, not only can you shower, not only can you buy 20 chocolate bars for $5, but it‚Äôs also a TA Travel Center. 20/10 would be told not to ‚Ä¶

This place has went downhill fast. Never enough parking, long wait for dilapidated showers(1hr+) and mediocre food(99 cent burger is just as good). Dirty guys have taken over the once rule of shower b4 u eat, I can smell the guys next to us ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ . The gal behind the counter was a little curt. I'd forgotten my glasses & asked if she'd read me the #'s to the showers, she rolled her eyes and pointed to the receipt again...I asked again what was the codes I needed, apologizing ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ a place to park, but regular otr drivers have to pay, instead of the companies storing their equipment for free. Food is standard microwave quality. For the same price, I go across the street. I get to take I shower, so that's a plus.
Nice clean hot shower ,yummy hot food at the Country Pride ,waitress was very attentive,and the cook did excellent job .I recommend this place  it also had lots of spots to park .
I'll never stop here again.  Use to be a good stop.  Now run down lots of dry bulk trailers dropped all over and had to pay 16 bucks to park at 3:30 pm. And wait 2hrs to get a shower.
